snippet: A makeshift memorial to Michael Brown in the middle of a Ferguson street was removed to allow paving, and a permanent tribute will be installed.
abstract: City of Ferguson, Mo, removes makeshift memorial to Michael Brown from street in order to allow paving; city says it will replace memorial with permanent tribute.
lead_paragraph: A makeshift memorial to Michael Brown in the middle of a Ferguson street was removed to allow paving, and a permanent tribute will be installed.

headline.main: Missouri: Michael Brown Memorial Is Removed for Road Work
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Michael Brown Memorial Is Removed for Road Work
